Package seedu.address.commons.util

Class JsonUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • seedu.address.commons.util.JsonUtil

  • public class JsonUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a Java object instance to JSON and vice versa

    • Method Detail

      • readJsonFile

        public static <T> java.util.Optional<T> readJsonFile​(java.nio.file.Path filePath,
                                                     java.lang.Class<T> classOfObjectToDeserialize)
                                              throws DataConversionException
        Returns the Json object from the given file or Optional.empty() object if the file is not found. If any values are missing from the file, default values will be used, as long as the file is a valid json file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - cannot be null.
        classOfObjectToDeserialize - Json file has to correspond to the structure in the class given here.
        Throws:
        DataConversionException - if the file format is not as expected.

      • saveJsonFile

        public static <T> void saveJsonFile​(T jsonFile,
                                    java.nio.file.Path filePath)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the Json object to the specified file. Overwrites existing file if it exists, creates a new file if it doesn't.
        Parameters:
        jsonFile - cannot be null
        filePath - cannot be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error during writing to the file

      • fromJsonString

        public static <T> T fromJsonString​(java.lang.String json,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> instanceClass)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Converts a given string representation of a JSON data to instance of a class
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type to create an instance of
        Returns:
        The instance of T with the specified values in the JSON string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toJsonString

        public static <T> java.lang.String toJsonString​(T instance)
                                         throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Converts a given instance of a class into its JSON data string representation
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type to create an instance of
        Parameters:
        instance - The T object to be converted into the JSON string
        Returns:
        JSON data representation of the given class instance, in string
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
